title: The Glass Alibi
description: The aftermath of a greedy business deal had Elizabeth Burnett swindled out of millions, beaten, raped, and dumped in a parking lot for dead.No force in heaven or power on earth would curtail her wrath or revenge.She needed an alibi. She needed someone to take the fall. Her amazing beauty, flawless figure and womanly ways would provide the lures... they always had.Nick Sloan, the Private Detective she'd hire would not know the twisted details of her deadly deceptions.Enter the glamorous but insidious web of an ultra-wealthy San Francisco socialite and dive into an unsettling character study laced with lust and murder.
author: John       Burns
